jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
A figure appears in a dark doorway
A hand starts moving from behind the shower curtain
Accompanied by a loud sound, the shot abruptly changes to show an old lady in a bathtub
A hand grabs Dan’s hand
Abra suddenly opens her pupil-less, all white eyes
The shot abruptly changes to show Abra sitting on the edge of her bed, her eyes all white
Accompanied by a loud sound, a light suddenly turns on in a dark corridor
The shot abruptly changes to an axe going through a door accompanied by screams and noise
The door slams shut
There is a sudden loud noise and the camera goes fuzzy
Sasha’s hair gets lifted from behind
T.C. gets pushed down the stairs
A bed frame lifts off the ground
A girl runs through the hallway
The film crew approach a girl in the corner of a room when she spins around and screams
A hand breaks through the door behind Sasha and grabs her
Someone jumps out of a bath tub full of blood and drags in T.C
Lance finds a tongue in the corner of the room, looks up, and sees a ghost on the roof
A figure runs at Lance in the hallway
Lance spins around to see a group of doctors working on a patient. Suddenly one jumps up close to Lance and screams
The camera rounds a corner to see a clown figure standing in the hallway
A scary-looking clown’s head is suddenly looking straight at the camera
A clown figure is seen standing in a doorway at the bottom of stairs
Bedcovers are lifted to reveal a  girl’s bloody face
The camera turns back to reveal scary clown mannequins sitting on the ground
A black figure standing behind a girl suddenly moves towards the camera, while screams are heard
Quinn listens against the wall and some sort of generator noise starts
During a quiet scene a car suddenly slams on its brakes and runs over a girl
Quinn looks around in her sleep and a face jumps at her
Elise jumps while lying in bed
While Quinn is resting, a hand grabs her from above
Elise follows dark footsteps onto the wall and looks up to see a demon
Quinn’s friend on skype notices someone in the room. Quinn glances around to see a figure behind the curtain
Quinn looks under the bed and is grabbed from above
Quinn is grabbed while lying on the ground
Quinn looks out the window and is grabbed by the demon
Elise approaches the back of a female who spreads her hair revealing her face
A dark clothed woman jumps at Elise
The camera spins around to reveal Quinn
Elise approaches a man sitting on a bed when she gets jumped by something
The red demon jumps out from behind Elise
A ladder cracks while Dalton is climbing it
A voice in the baby monitor yells “NOW”
Renai sees a man standing behind her daughter’s crib
The burglar alarm goes off
The burglar alarm goes off again
Renai wakes from a nightmare
A strange man walks through Renai’s bedroom before lunging at her
A small boy runs behind Renai
The door bursts open behind Renai
The small boy opens the wardrobe door and runs out in front of Renai
Lorraine sees a red faced demon standing behind Josh
Tucker sees the image of two women in dresses through his UV light camera
There is a cracking sound and a bright flash of light, followed by several more flashes of light over the next few minutes
Dalton suddenly appears beside the table
A woman in a wedding dress walks past Josh
A strange smiling family suddenly appear in front of Josh
A man suddenly appears in front of the red door
A red faced demon appears beside Josh
A hand reaches out of the drawer as it is being closed
The door bursts open and the strange screaming family are revealed
Tucker shines a torch on a mysterious man
Dalton opens the door in his bedroom and the red demon jumps out from behind
The demon grabs Daltons leg from underneath the bed
A mysterious lady lunges at Elise

Esther turns the lights on and off several times seeing the silhouette of a woman in the darkness each time. As Ether turns the lights off once more, the silhouette of the woman suddenly appears much closer to Esther than previous times
As the lights turn back on, the figure appears standing behind Paul
Paul is suddenly dragged away into the darkness
A shadowy figure appears on the other side of the door that Martin looks through
As the room goes dark once again, the silhouette attacks Rebecca
Rebecca is pulled towards the ceiling by Diana
Martin looks up and sees Diana directly above him
Martin is suddenly pulled under the bed
As Martin backs away, Diana appears behind him
Martin is dragged along the floor by Diana
Diana pulls Bret away
Diana suddenly appears directly in front of Bret
Diana jumps out at Bret as he runs down the driveway
Sophie is thrown to the floor as she reaches for her pills
Rebecca shines the black light on a figure with its back turned to her, it suddenly turns around and screams
A hand grabs Rebecca around the wrist
Diana attacks a police officer
A hand reaches for Rebecca out of the slightly ajar door behind her
Diana drops down behind Rebecca
There is a loud noise and Dennis falls flat
As the camera zooms in on Kristi the power suddenly cuts out
A ball is thrown at the camera
Some sort of spirit flies past the camera
Mike appears behind Skylar
Something flies out of the pool
Leila appears in front of the camera
The bathroom mirror cracks
The dark entity flies at the camera
A figure suddenly rushes at the camera accompanied by a loud noise
Something falls down in front of the camera, startling Emily
Leila suddenly walks in on Ryan and Mike who are looking at camera footage
A Santa toy suddenly turns on
Emma begins talking behind Ryan
Something bangs on the bedroom window
A dark entity bursts through the window behind Emily
Leila suddenly attacks Father Todd
The dark entity rushes past the camera
A toy turns on
The entity whooshes past the camera
An abrupt camera change may startle some viewers
The dark entity can briefly be seen as Leila’s bedroom door suddenly closes
Some sort of force radiates out from the hole in Leila’s wall
The entity suddenly strangles and drags away Father Todd
A hand impales Ryan through the chest
Emily turns the camera night vision on and Katie is shown to be standing in front of the camera
Emily turns around to see Leila watching her
Toby’s foot lands in front of the camera
The camera abruptly cuts off
A shadow movies behind Ellison
Trevor begins screaming while coming out of a box
A loud bang startles Ellison
There is a loud banging noise while Ellison is in the attic
Ellison lifts a box lid to uncover a snake
Ellison falls through the attic floor. [Video]
Bughuul’s face on Ellison’s laptop begins to move
Ellison lowers the print of Bughuul’s face only to see the same face mirrored in the backyard outside. [Video]
Ellison sees Trevor’s face hiding in the bushes
Several deceased children are seen standing behind Ellison
A tied up body suddenly comes into view in front of lawnmower. [Video]
A deceased girl appears beside Ellison. [Video]
A deceased girl in a yellow coat appears in the hallway
A deceased girl sits beside Ashley’s bed
Bughuul’s face suddenly appears in front of Ellison while he is peering into the attic. [Video]
A box labelled home movies drops from the attic and lands on the floor beside Ellison
Bughuul’s face abruptly drops into view, just before the final credits roll. [Video]
Kaylee drops her flashlight and screams as Kevin comes back from the bathroom
A hand grabs the doorframe and Kaylee screeches
Kaylee’s eyeless and mouthless face suddenly appears on screen with a loud droning whine sound
The shot of the toy phone cuts to a near identical shot where the phone is smiling wider and looking at the camera, accompanied by a loud ringing
A large gush of blood spills out of the hall accompanied by a scream. This shot repeats 3 times
George sees a girl with a noose around her neck while him and Kathy are having sex
A ghost appears next to Michael when he is trying to use the tap. [Video]
George walks into a room where a girl is held to the roof with someone else’s hands
A silhouette runs past the camera as Kathy is washing the dishes
A girl appears behind Lisa
Hands grab George while he is in the bathtub and pull him under the water
A teddy bear fals on the ground next to George
A face in the projector changes to a demonic face
Something runs at George and he retaliates using his axe
Flies fly out of the vent at Father Callaway. [Video]
Kathy spins around to see George
A figure jumps out at George from inside a cell. [Video]
Kathy begins to walk through the doorway and George appears
George grabs Kathy
A face appears in the window Kathy is trying to open
George wakes up suddenly
The ghost girl is grabbed through the floor
A sudden loud noise as the scene changes to a classroom setting
A reflection in the window suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound effect
A hand grabs Florence as she reaches into the lake
A distorted child’s face comes into view through the peep hole
A face comes out of the pillow beside Florence
A child ghost jumps out at the groundskeeper as he hovers over the unconscious Florence
A loud bang startles the two girls
The door to the girl’s bedroom slams shut
Carolyn searches the house and a loud bang erupts from paintings falling off the wall
Carolyn enters the basement but as she goes to leave the door slams in her face
Hands clap behind Carolyn while she is in the basement
A monster appears on the top of the girl’s closet
A sheet blows off the washing line and catches around a figure
As Roger leaves a room, a lady shouts “look what you made me do!”
Lorraine pulls away the music box revealing an old lady behind it
Legs fall down from the side of the table as Lorraine looks out from underneath
Nancy’s hair gets pulled upwards
One of the children gets pulled in their bed
A loud gunshot during a quiet scene may startle some viewers
The woman on the bed turns her head suddenly and says “what did you do”
The little boy laughs and runs past Lorraine
The Lutz family suddenly appear in front of Lorraine
Lorraine looks back at the mirror and the nun is standing right behind her reflection, she looks away and looks back once more and the nun is now right in front of her. [Video]
Janet starts talking in a much deeper voice
Janet starts talking again and is revealed to be standing directly in front of Margaret’s bed
A man’s voice roars loudly. [Video]
A telephone rings during a quiet scene
Janet sees a reflection on the television of a man sitting on a chair
The man now appears behind Janet and he screams “my house”. [Video]
Janet wakes from her sleep as she crashes to the floor
A man yells and the bed sheets are pulled off Janet’s bed
The bedside cabinet suddenly slides across the room
A tape player suddenly turns on during a tense scene
After putting her hands around the painting the nun suddenly runs at Lorraine. [Video]
Bill shouts Janet’s name and attacks her. [Video]
Through an opening in the door Peggy sees Janet be pulled away and replaced with Bill
Peggy looks down and sees Bill’s face in the water. He reaches out and grabs Peggy’s arm
Janet reappears in the kitchen holding a knife
The nun puts her hand on Bill’s shoulder. [Video]
Ed looks up from the turntable and sees the crooked man looking at him
Yoko turns around in the attic and sees a ghostly woman’s face
Karen opens a door and a hand grabs her foot
A cat yowls, scaring Karen
Karen is startled by the phone ringing
A shadow can be seen passing a window
Emma gasps and a ghostly figure can be seen hovering above her
A hand comes out of a bath tub and grabs a man’s arm
Someone reaches down and grabs the cat on the stairs
A boy pops out from beside Jen’s bed and hisses at Matt
The boy screams at Matt
The boy peers down from above Matt and screams again
As Susan goes up in the elevator, the strange boy can be seen on each floor
The ghostly woman peaks out at Susan from under the covers
Karen sees the reflection of the ghostly girl in the bus window accompanied by a croaking noise
As Alex walks down the stairs, the strange boy can be seen sitting in a corner
Detective Nakagawa is reviewing the security footage when a shadowy figure rises up directly in front of the security camera
The boy opens his eyes then pushes Detective Nakagawa’s head into the bathtub
A corpse falls down from the attic in front of Peter
The ghostly woman can be seen in the reflection of the mirror as Karen walks past it
Doug’s hand reaches out and grabs Karen’s foot as she looks into the mirror
Karen opens a door and sees the ghostly woman’s face behind it
Karen goes to lift the sheet covering Doug’s body when it begins to twitch
The camera begins to pan, revealing the ghostly woman is standing behind Karen
Jennifer opens a door and sees the outline of a figure standing there
There is a loud knock at the door during a tense scene
Luke comes through a door, scaring Jennifer and Lauren
Jennifer turns around and sees a shadow moving across the wall
Luke bursts through the bedroom door
There are several quick cuts to the twins lying in the hallway covered in blood
Jack jumps out and attacks Hallorann with an axe
The camera quickly pans to show a bloodied man standing in the hallway behind Wendy
Dirty water starts pouring into the bath
A bird flies out of the fireplace
The bird flaps again
A man appears behind Arthur
As Arthur looks through a hole in the door, a face appears
Arthur spins a lamp and sees a face inside
Arthur looks up at a building window and sees a face inside
A face comes up behind Arthur as he looks out the window
Arthur touches the window and upon contact is greeted with a screaming lady
Arthur sees something in the mirror
A screaming face appears
Arthur opens the door and Mr. Bentley is standing there
The woman in black yells and slides towards Arthur
The woman in black screams once more
Arthur looks around the train station and sees the woman in black
Mr. Bentley sees the woman in black behind the train
